column4: I have HPLip 0.9.7 (Ubuntu 6.06) installed and want to update it to the one of HP 2.9.8 .. If i go to Synaptic it says that it will uninstall also ubuntu-desktop .. is it save to do so?
ubuntu-desktop is just a metapackage, so yes.  But Have you considered upgrading to Hardy?
got alot of software (i know is bad) which is installed as tar .. so until i am finished with the thesis i cannot upgrade to hardy
Fair enough.  In the future, make sure all of that goes in /usr/local/* which will make upgrading easier (of course, you likely already know this)
